mapper.insert: insert into tb_health_archive (b_id, b_name, b_sex, b_nation, b_birthday, b_blood_type, b_weight, b_heght, b_waistline, b_age, b_tel, b_relation_name, b_relation_tel, b_address, b_education, b_jobs, b_personid, b_insurance, b_marriage, b_time,h_id,h_source,b_province,b_city,b_county,b_original_address) values (#{bId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bBloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{bHeght,jdbcType=REAL}, #{bWaistline,jdbcType=REAL}, #{bAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bRelationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bRelationTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bEducation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bJobs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bPersonid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bInsurance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bMarriage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{hId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ,#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{b_original_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_health_archive set b_name = #{bName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_sex = #{bSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, b_nation = #{bNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_birthday = #{bBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, b_blood_type = #{bBloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_weight = #{bWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, b_heght = #{bHeght,jdbcType=REAL}, b_waistline = #{bWaistline,jdbcType=REAL}, b_age = #{bAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_tel = #{bTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_relation_name = #{bRelationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_relation_tel = #{bRelationTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_address = #{bAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_education = #{bEducation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_jobs = #{bJobs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_personid = #{bPersonid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_insurance = #{bInsurance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_marriage = #{bMarriage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_time = #{bTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, h_id= #{hId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, h_source=#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_province=#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_city=#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_county=#{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_original_address=#{original_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where b_id = #{bId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
